name: Utility
brief: Utility data structures and helpers used throughout the Orca API.

contents.name: Algebra
contents.brief: Types and helpers for vectors and matrices.

contents.name: Debug
contents.brief: Helpers for logging, asserting and aborting.

contents.name: Lists
contents.brief: Types and helpers for doubly-linked lists.

contents.name: oc_list_elt
contents.doc: An element of an intrusive doubly-linked list.

fields.name: prev
fields.doc: Points to the previous element in the list.

fields.name: next
fields.doc: Points to the next element in the list.

fields.name: first
fields.doc: Points to the first element in the list.

fields.name: last
fields.doc: Points to the last element in the list.

contents.name: File API
contents.brief: API for opening, reading and writing files.

contents.name: Dialogs
contents.brief: API for obtaining file capabilities through open/save dialogs.

contents.name: GLES Surface
contents.brief: A surface for rendering using the GLES API.
